scripts.test-unit: echo ; echo '[+] Running Unit Tests' ; echo ; ./vendor/bin/phpunit --testdox tests/Unit
scripts.test-integration: echo ; echo '[+] Running Integration Tests' ; echo ; ./vendor/bin/phpunit --testdox tests/Integration
scripts.test: echo ; echo '[+] Running Full Unit/Integration Test Suite' ; echo ; ./vendor/bin/phpunit --testdox tests/
